edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics

Class MulticlassPredictionComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics.MulticlassPredictionComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultComparator

    public class MulticlassPredictionComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResultComparator
    Computes statistics for multiclass prediction. NOTE: Currently only works with binary predicates of the form (example, label) or (label, example), where example is a single GroundTerm and label is a single IntegerAttribute.

      • compare

        public PredictionStatistics compare(Predicate p,
                           java.util.Map<GroundTerm,java.lang.Integer> labelMap,
                           int labelIndex)
        Returns prediction statistics in the form of a confusion matrix.
        Parameters:
        p - A predicate
        labelMap - A map indicating the mapping from the label to an index.
        labelIndex - The index of the label in each example's terms.
        Returns:
        A MulticlassPredictionStatistics.
